# Yellow cab table

| Planet  | 1 Planetary day  | Distance from the Sun | Moons |
| ------- | ---------------- | --------------------- | ----- |
| Earth   | 24 hours         | 149.6 million km      | 1     |
| Mercury | 58.7 Earth days  | 57.9 million km       | 0     |
| Venus   | 243 Earth days   | 108.2 million km      | 0     |
| Mars    | 24.6 Earth hours | 227.9 million km      | 2     |
| Jupiter | 9.84 Earth hours | 778.3 million km      | 67    |
| Saturn  | 10.2 Earth hours | 1,427.0 million km    | 62    |
| Uranus  | 17.9 Earth hours | 2,871.0 million km    | 27    |
| Neptune | 19.1 Earth hours | 4,497.1 million km    | 13    |
